scripts.migrate:postgres:test: npm run docker:test:up && dotenv -e .env.test -- npx prisma migrate reset --force && dotenv -e .env.test -- npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.test:integration: npm run migrate:postgres:test && dotenv -e .env.test -- jest -i --verbose --testMatch='**/integration/**/*.test.ts' ; npm run docker:test:down
scripts.test:integration:watch: npm run migrate:postgres:test && dotenv -e .env.test -- jest -i --verbose --watch --testMatch='**/integration/**/*.test.ts' ; npm run docker:test:down
scripts.test:integration:coverage: npm run migrate:postgres:test && dotenv -e .env.test -- jest -i --verbose --testMatch='**/integration/**/*.test.ts' --coverage ; npm run docker:test:down
scripts.dev: npm run docker:dev:up && npm run migrate:postgres:dev && dotenv -e .env.development -- nodemon --exec ts-node src/index.ts
